did.abstract: Located at 105 West 40th St. in New York City. Business would design an advertisement, then "broadcast" it via a light beam onto the sidewalk in front of the business: "Your complete sales message told in bright colorful light--where every passerby must see it!"

Collection comprises a mock-up advertisement for Tettemer Ellison plumbing, heating contractors in Hewlett, Long Island. The back of the ad has a message from the designer that in creating the design they used the wrong company name, with the correction of either F. E. Ellison or E. A. Ellison, "instead of Tettemer & Ellison."
